summary: Created comprehensive documentation and organized admin panel structure. Created ARCHITECTURE.md (system architecture, tech stack, patterns), API.md (complete API reference), COMPONENTS.md (component documentation), DEPLOYMENT.md (deployment guide), and updated main README.md with improved structure. Organized admin panel with barrel exports (api/index.ts, components/ui/index.ts, components/forms/index.ts) and created API client modules (products.ts, translations.ts, auth.ts) for better code organization. All documentation is in docs/ directory.
current_status: Documentation complete. Admin panel structure organized. Build successful. Project ready for development and deployment.
